Precondition: Spec#: type foo( «parameters» ) requires expression { body }
Postcondition: Spec#: type foo( «parameters» ) ensures expression { body }

Precondition: f require tag: expression do end
Postcondition: f do ensure tag: expression end
Check: f do check tag: expression end end
Invariant: class X invariant tag: expression end
Loop: from instructions invariant tag: expression until expr loop instructions variant tag: expression end
